DOC.brief_summary: Background : Several study report increased resting energy expenditure ( REE ) people live HIV/AIDS possibly due change body composition occur HIV lipodystrophy syndrome . The aim study evaluate influence use lipid-lowering drug rest energy expenditure ( REE ) total energy expenditure ( TEE ) patient seropositive HIV treatment lipodystrophy .
DOC.brief_title: Energy Expenditure People Living With HIV/AIDS
DOC.detailed_description: REE measure indirect calorimetry . TEE measure doubly label water ( DLW ) technique activity monitor base accelerometry ( AM ) .
DOC.criteria: Use antiretroviral therapy least 4 month A cluster differentiation 4 ( CD4 ) Tcell count > 200 cells/mm3 Use lipidlowering drug least 1 month ( group HIVseropositive lipodystrophy use lipidlowering ) Signs symptom opportunistic infection Thyroid disease
